name: CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF FORT WORTH
description: Nonprofit community focused charitable organization addressing and preventing poverty.
sampleDescriptions: Combating poverty through initiatives to encourage educational achievement and completion.
Associates Degree student retention as means of addressing poverty level among underrepresented groups and minorities.
